mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tborder(orderId, payment, paymentType, postFee, status, createTime, updateTime, paymentTime, consignTime, endTime, closeTime, shippingName, shippingCode, userId, buyerMessage, buyerNick, buyerRate) VALUE (#{orderId},#{payment},#{paymentType},#{postFee},#{status},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{paymentTime},#{consignTime},#{endTime},#{closeTime},#{shippingName},#{shippingCode},#{userId},#{buyerMessage},#{buyerNick},#{buyerRate})
